interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Every Beauty All in One Foot Smoother, 2 different smoothing surfaces
Review Date: 2016/01/26
Store: Every Beauty
Product Description: ['Dermabrasion coatings removes rough dry cracked skin and calluses from feet. Custom forms to your foot to ensure even coverage on skin. Soft and flexible to get calluses in between and under toes. Proudly Made in the USA']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Every Beauty', 'Color': 'Pink', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.75 x 1 x 2.75 inches', 'Number of Items': '24', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 1 x 2.75 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3001001', 'UPC': '858651002061', 'Manufacturer': 'Consumer Inspired Products'}
Review Text: This works and works well. The reason I can't give it a full  5-star review is because of the price. There is a very similar product that is way cheaper and works as well or better than this one. I found Sole Magic online for about a dollar cheaper than this one. In superstores and drug stores, I found it for a couple of bucks. This one does work and I can't say one negative thing about it - other than the price. When a pedicure is around $20 (even here in Alaska where prices are high), and I can do upkeep with a similar foot smoothing pad for about $2, I just can't see paying almost $9 for this one. If other customers do want this one, I can tell you that it works, the shape is nice and makes it easy to grip and use with either hand. It's also nice that their is a coarse side and a finer side. One thing that I disagree with is that you could use this anywhere but on your feet. I don't know what would have to be going on with anyone's elbows or knees for them to use this on! All in all, a great product, but a bit overpriced when there are cheaper alternative items that are just as effective.
Review Title: Great item, but there are more affordable alternatives
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Frownies Immune Perfect Daily Moisturizer, 0.3 Ounce
FROWNIES
['Frownies Immune Perfect Continuous Active Hydration: Will make you experience continuous active hydration and dual protection against free radical. Helps prevent skin cell damage and helps nourish the DNA that reduces inflammation and boosts the immune system of the skin.']
{'Brand': 'FROWNIES', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '724498132578', 'Manufacturer': 'Buy Smart LLC'}
Love, love, LOVE this moisturizer. I love it so much that I may have replaced my Avon Anew. This one costs quite a bit, but the tiny travel sized tube will last a while. This is a VERY watery product, but that's great for 2 reasons: 1) a little bit goes a long way, and 2) it absorbs really well into the skin. The best way that I have found to apply this is to tap the lotion onto my fingertips, then just sort of dab it onto my face before rubbing it in. This saves on product and keeps me from spilling any from the tube. Like I said, this has a very "wet" texture, so you won't have to use much. The price is way up there but, compared to using a lot of a cheaper product (that doesn't work as well), or a same-priced product (but using more of it), this is the best value overall. I'm going to see how long the travel-sized tube lasts while I save up for a larger size. Since this is something I have to save for, I really wish there were more size/price choices. Still, I love this and I think my skin is getting addicted to it!
Pretty Pricey But Worth It!
Every Beauty All in One Foot Smoother, 2 different smoothing surfaces
Every Beauty
['Dermabrasion coatings removes rough dry cracked skin and calluses from feet. Custom forms to your foot to ensure even coverage on skin. Soft and flexible to get calluses in between and under toes. Proudly Made in the USA']

This works and works well. The reason I can't give it a full  5-star review is because of the price. There is a very similar product that is way cheaper and works as well or better than this one. I found Sole Magic online for about a dollar cheaper than this one. In superstores and drug stores, I found it for a couple of bucks. This one does work and I can't say one negative thing about it - other than the price. When a pedicure is around $20 (even here in Alaska where prices are high), and I can do upkeep with a similar foot smoothing pad for about $2, I just can't see paying almost $9 for this one. If other customers do want this one, I can tell you that it works, the shape is nice and makes it easy to grip and use with either hand. It's also nice that their is a coarse side and a finer side. One thing that I disagree with is that you could use this anywhere but on your feet. I don't know what would have to be going on with anyone's elbows or knees for them to use this on! All in all, a great product, but a bit overpriced when there are cheaper alternative items that are just as effective.
Great item, but there are more affordable alternatives
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Enthusiast:** Demonstrates a strong preference for moisturizers with a focus on hydration and skin health, while also exploring products aimed at foot care.
- **Value-Conscious:** Willing to invest in higher-priced skincare products if they demonstrate superior efficacy, but increasingly aware of price comparisons and alternative options, suggesting a growing emphasis on cost-effectiveness.
- **Product Performance:** Prioritizes products with good absorption and minimal application requirements, favoring those with a watery or light texture.
- **Sustainability Mindset:** Interested in reducing waste by using products efficiently, preferring methods that conserve product, such as tapping and dabbing.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Established a preference for the FROWNIES brand, indicating a switch from a previous favorite, but has recently tested new brands, showcasing openness to alternatives in the market.
- **Desires Variety:** Expresses a desire for more size and price options, indicating a need for flexibility in product availability.
- **Long-Term Commitment:** Willing to save for larger sizes, demonstrating a commitment to incorporating effective, quality products into the skincare routine. 

In summary, the user values quality and efficiency in skincare while maintaining a focus on affordability and exploring innovative alternatives for overall body care, signifying a holistic approach to beauty and wellness.
